column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Super tasty foods.  Been here for paella
column3: flamenco.. it's all been good.  I love bringing people here.  The best tapas I've had in the city.  I crave this place way more than I make it here
column4: which is unfortunate.  Get some bacon wrapped dates!  Get some potato bravas
column5: scallops.. goat cheese bread.. agh... SOOO GOOD!  If this place were either cheaper or closer
column6: I'd be here at least once a month.  Sangria is pretty decent.
